org.jacp.api.component

Interface IComponent<L,A,M>

  • Type Parameters:
    L - defines the action listener type
    A - defines the basic action type
    M - defines the basic message type
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.String>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IPerspective<L,A,M>, IPerspectiveView<C,L,A,M>, IStatelessCallabackComponent<L,A,M>, ISubComponent<L,A,M>, IUIComponent<C,L,A,M>

    public interface IComponent<L,A,M>
extends java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.String>
    This Interface represents a very basic component that can exists in JACP environment.

      Represents the location of your resource bundle file.
